snippet.title: NINJA KATO 1
snippet.description:
【NINJA KATO】【game】【retro game】

First in the Ninja Kato series!

Now available in the nostalgic portable game style!

Clear all 4 stages and train Kato!

December 8, 2023 Release!

Sold on Steam, Epic Games, and Google Play!

●Steam
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2653330/NINJA_KATO_1/
●Epic Games
https://store.epicgames.com/en-US/p/ninja-kato-1-47e118?lang=en-US
●Google Play
https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.KIBODO.NINJAKATO1
